item.title: Jerometed add a quote by Jorge Luis Borges
item.description: "I have always imagined that Paradise will be a kind of library." -- Jorge Luis Borges

item.title: Jerometed add a quote by Paul Valéry
item.description: "The folly of mistaking a paradox for a discovery, a metaphor for a proof, a torrent of verbiage for a spring of capital truths, and oneself for an oracle, is inborn in us." -- Paul Valéry

item.title: Jerometed add a quote by Paul Valéry
item.description: "My hand feels touched as well as it touches; reality says this, and nothing more." -- Paul Valéry

item.title: Jerometed add a quote by Paul Valéry
item.description: "To see is to forget the name of the thing one sees." -- Paul Valéry

item.title: Jerometed add a quote by Jan Valtin
item.description: "We were the unflinching prisoners of a grandiose make-believe, we who looked upon ourselves as heard-headed materialists. We dismissed the distress of today, the human wreckage scattered all about us, the terror and militarism prevailing in the country with the stereotyped belief that we were marching forward with great strides." -- Jan Valtin

item.title: Jerometed add a quote by Jan Valtin
item.description: "Prisons are built to break men, and when men are broken society has consummated its revenge" -- Jan Valtin

item.title: Jerometed add a quote by Jan Valtin
item.description: "A man lives his life only when he is marching, i thought, when he keeps marching onwards at any price. When he stops marching onwards, he decays. The joy of life is the joy of the experience that comes from feeling one's own strength." -- Jan Valtin

item.title: Jerometed add a quote by Jan Valtin
item.description: "Break the character and independence of your man and you will have an obedient trooper." -- Jan Valtin

item.title: Jerometed add a quote by Jan Valtin
item.description: "I would not have shied away from an assignment to sail a canoe around Cape Horn or to take charge of the government of Afghanistan." -- Jan Valtin

item.title: Jerometed add a quote by Jan Valtin
